thread.title: John McDonnell: Poisoned air killing Heathrow residents
thread.title_full: John McDonnell: Poisoned air killing Heathrow residents

title: John McDonnell: Poisoned air killing Heathrow residents
text: [news] 04:55 What utter dribble; in the short term a 3rd runway would reduce pollution, as there would be little or no stacking and reduced time idling in a queue waiting for takeoff. Medium+long term pollution may increase if traffic levels rise as predicted but this is likely to be mitigated or reversed by the gradual replacement of older, less efficient aircraft with newer and better ones.
